= Closures =
{{{
Closure plus1 = {int a, int b -> return a + b }
Closure plus2 = {int a, int b -> a + b }
Closure plus3 = {a, b -> a + b }
def plus4 = {a, b -> a + b }
// implicit parameter "it"
def plus5 = {it + 5}
}}}
